Title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
Writer: William Hanna (animated series), Joseph Barbera (animated series), Deborah Kaplan, Harry Elfont, Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr.
Actors: Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Kristen Johnston, Jane Krakowski
Plot: In this live-action prequel to The Flintstones (1994), the Flintstones and the Rubbles go on a trip to Rock Vegas, where Wilma Slaghoople (Kristen Johnston) is pursued by playboy Chip Rockefeller (Thomas Gibson).
Production: Universal Pictures, Hanna-Barbera Productions, Amblin Entertainment
